about_the_game:
Important note: This DLC will be merged into the base game and will be removed from the store once episode 4 is completed.

As the reality of war finally reveals its ugly face, Junius and the rest of the 1st fleet have no choice but to persist forwards despite the unfavorable conditions laid out in front of them. However, not all is what it seems. As the mystery of how the Martians were able to obtain this technology comes to a head, more than a few questions are raised as the war rushes towards its bloody conclusion.

Sierra Ops Episode 4: Cadence of the Morning Star is the final part of a four-part series where both decisions made and performance in combat change the power balance of the two armed forces.

Is it even possible to end this war without losing everything?

With the release of the final chapter, “New Game +” mode will be unlocked and playable with any save that has reached any one of the normal endings of the game.

...Will this time be different? One can only wonder.

Game Features:

  • Over 100, 000 words spread out across different decisions and outcomes based on choices during prior episodes.

  • Make or Break your relationships! How deep does your bond run during these times filled with death and despair?

  • Over 8 different endings, and countless variations to experience.

    New Game + Features:

  • Over 100, 000 words of new content, dialogue, choices, and outcomes across all episodes. Previously locked outcomes are now accessible.

  • LITE. The mysterious text log that claims to predict the future will shake Junius to his core.

  • A whole new character to interact with. A person from Junius’ past resurfaces due to changing circumstances.

  • Unveil the hidden truths previously ignored. What exactly is everyone hiding?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Woefully ill-prepared, play as Captain Fahrenheit as they uncover long-lost secrets new and old, while fighting in an impossible war between Earth and Mars.
